modName: LC_Immersive Looting - Immersive Names and Custom Races Fix
summary: Corrects RNAM records so this mod's jewelry will show up on custom races.
descriptionHtml:
This is an expansion of Borgiak's fix for Locaster's LC_Immersive Looting.

[b]Description[/b]

This keeps Borgiak's changes to the enchantment names BUT arranges the wording for better sorting.  I also changed Super to Superb.  Because why not.
Additionally, this corrects the RNAM records so that the jewelry will appear on custom races.

[b]Installation[/b]

Install to Data manually or with your manager, and let this mod overwrite when requested.

[b]Compatibility
[/b]
Should be compatible with anything that doesn't change the original mod.  I have no idea how well it will work with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59117/?]LC_Immersive Looting enchantments  [/url]but it should be fine.

[b]Requirements
[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44106/?]LC_immersive Looting[/url] by Locaster.

[b]Suggested Download[/b]

Please get the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68632/?]LC_Immersive Looting Names Fix[/url] and endorse it.

[b]Credits[/b]
Locaster for LC_immersive Looting (permission granted via PM)
Borgiak for LC_Immersive Looting Names Fix (permission granted via PM)
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
The xEdit Team for TES5Edit
author: padawanjedi
